mapper.select: select star from p_cls_rep where cno = #{no} limit #{rowNo},#{size};
select meno,cno,titl,conts,star,phot,rgdt from p_cls_rep order by rno asc;
select ps.cno, psp.rno from p_mete as pe inner join p_cls_rep as psp on pe.meno = psp.meno inner join p_cls as ps on psp.cno = ps.cno where psp.rno = #{no} order by psp.rno asc

select psp.rno, pe.nick, pe.phot as mp, psp.conts, psp.phot, psp.star, psp.rgdt, pe.meno, ps.cno, ps.titl, ps.cfile from p_mete as pe inner join p_cls_rep as psp on pe.meno = psp.meno inner join p_cls as ps on psp.cno = ps.cno order by psp.rgdt desc limit 0,4

select * from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rnum, psp.rno, pe.nick, pe.phot as mp, psp.conts, psp.phot, psp.star, psp.rgdt, pe.meno, ps.cno from p_mete as pe inner join p_cls_rep as psp on pe.meno = psp.meno inner join p_cls as ps on psp.cno = ps.cno ,(select @rownum:=0)r where ps.cno = #{no} order by psp.rno desc ) as a where rnum limit #{rowNo},#{size}
select count(*) from p_mete as pe inner join p_cls_rep as psp on pe.meno = psp.meno inner join p_cls as ps on psp.cno = ps.cno where ps.cno = #{no} order by psp.rno asc
mapper.update: update p_cls_rep set conts = #{conts}, rgdt = now() where rno = #{no}
